RelatedSentence: LOS ANGELES ( Reuters ) - Americans typically spend nearly $ 5 billion on gifts for graduates , with a little over half giving cash and a third offering gift cards , according to last year 's National Retail Federation survey .
Those surveyed spent an average of $ 49 , which wo n't buy a laptop , a retirement fund or many of the other gifts often touted as financially savvy .
